sentences.english: His scalp is spotted like the skin of a rainbow trout.
sentences.chinese: 他那沒了頭髮的腦殼看上去就像虹鱒魚的魚皮。

sentences.english: Most people might answer, “At the skull.”
sentences.chinese: 對於這個問題，多數人都會回答說“就在腦殼裏”。

sentences.english: He whomped the ruffian on the skull.
Please let the memories of being with you flow into my thick skull.
sentences.chinese: 請讓與您在一起的回憶湧入我的厚腦殼。

sentences.english: Passes into my heart and brain.
The tumor presses on the skull, poor girl, and makes her groggy.
sentences.chinese: 那快腫瘤壓迫着腦殼，可憐的姑娘，叫她昏頭漲腦的。

sentences.english: I can hear it, rust-worn gears flaking and groaning slowly into motion, even smell it, yellow smoke emanating from his skull.
sentences.chinese: 我甚至能聞到他腦殼裏冒出來的黃煙。
